alert.note: Alert for Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 24 at 7:33PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN EDDY AND CENTRAL LEA COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM MDT... At 733 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Maljamar to 27 miles west of Monument to 7 miles southeast of Malaga. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Lovington, Monument, Humble City, Maljamar, Halfway, Industrial Airpark, and Lea County Regional Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Lea County; Eddy County Plains; Northern Lea County; Southern Lea County
